title: Ticket #408: condor_status should project it's selection on the collector side
description: Igor's collectors have lots and lots of machines. If you query a schedd with condor_q, only the relevant attributes are returned to the client. This is a big win, especially over slow networks. We need to do the same thing for the collector.
check_ins: 2009-May-11 17:10   Check-in [14671]: condor_status tells the server to project attributes #408 This speeds up condor_status on big pools by a factor of 10 Memory usage is also down by a factor of 10. Only supports -format and normal condor_status now. (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
